website_summaries.verdict: According to many runners, the Adidas Solar Glide ST is a highly recommendable running shoe, especially for overpronators who run on a regular basis. The shoe was very efficient and reliable, and it was able to deliver a solid performance no matter how long the distance. Many reviewers expressed their hope for the Solar Glide ST to stay in the market for an extended period of time.
pros: The majority of the users of the Adidas Solar Glide ST described it as a comfortable shoe
A great-looking running shoe, a couple of reviewers
The shoe fitted like a glove even at first use, said a wearer
Another stated that it didn’t need a break-in period
The Solar Glide ST was surprisingly durable and hard-wearing, as told by a customer
One buyer claimed the Solar Glide ST as Adidas’ most effective stability shoe
Many runners were happy that the shoe was lightweight
The shoe provided a fast and snappy ride, according to a reviewer
One user appreciated the unique heel design, which stood out among all the other structural elements of the shoe
cons: One runner said they got a few blisters from wearing the shoe

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: My son loved these shoes when we got them. They were his favorite among all other sdidas options. The shoe tore after 6 weeks of use on the fabric by the small toe. Unbelievably disappointed in the quality especially because it is selling for $140 in the stores Amazon was great with the return process.
customer_reviews.author: gina mesulam

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: This product is a wrack! I have purchased it through Amazon Prime Wardrobe in February after about two moth irregular wear I have discovered that some stitches went off and some of the detailing was pilling off. Never purchase this product it is even hard to get a refund for this as well.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Mojnov

customer_reviews.title: NOT as advertised these are not Stability shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are advertised as Stability shoes or "ST" but they are not. Running on the wrong shoes can cause serious injury to the runner! Be aware before you purchase these!
customer_reviews.author: ken padilla

customer_reviews.title: great for Achilles tendinitis/Haglund’s deformity
customer_reviews.text: Broke these in during covid-19 walks/runs. I have about 20 miles on them so far- i like the soft “knit” fit at the heel-Achilles tendon insertion area. i suffer from achilles tendinitis and Haglund’s deformity. I believe the way these shoes are designed should decrease the amount of pain experience due to that condition. These have good soft cushions and great tread. I believe the midsole could use more support in the planterI believe the midsole could use more support in the planter area, but I’m trying to strengthen that without artificial support right now so the issues seem to be perfect. I’m 37-year-old male that’s 210 pounds and could easily run 5 miles in these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: dmccleese

customer_reviews.title: Rubs ankle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this a half size bigger for added comfort. Well the toe room was great but when I walk in them my ankle bone hits the edge. Poor design. Unfortunately typical for big sizes (15) they make the whole shoe bigger but people with big feet have big ankle bones so shoes need to be longer not taller in the back.
customer_reviews.author: sMagana

customer_reviews.title: Seams coming apart! Terrible product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this pair of shoes because I really liked a similar par I had bought before. Unfortunately these are already coming apart. The seams are starting to come apart and I haven't used the shoes to go running yet!! I have been breaking into them by wearing them to work (office work) so I am really surprised that this is happening now.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Cornejo

customer_reviews.title: Recurring Shoe Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair, due to normal wear-and-tear. They're super light and breath great! I'll keep buying this model until they aren't sold anymore. I use them for long-distance on sidewalks/asphalt.
customer_reviews.author: Lt Dan

customer_reviews.title: Not Running-Shoe Quality
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was buying running shoe quality like the old supernova sequence I’ve been buying from Adidas for decades. Nowhere near that kind of support for the sole or soul. A long pickleball match left my joints aching like I'd been playing in street shoes. Immediately ordered a new pair of supernovas and crossed these off my list. They do look cool though. At least to me. So I couldn’t 1 star em.
customer_reviews.author: jbridges

customer_reviews.title: Not an ST stability shoe as listed
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these shoes expecting the Solar Glide ST which is what is listed. I received the shoes, however, they were not a stability shoe (see the attached picture for what the stability labeled heel is supposed to look like). At any rate, the shoes were comfortable and fit well, but I returned them as I need them for running and require a stability sole to prevent posterior shin splints. Don’t order these shoes from here if you’re needing a stability shoe, the listing is incorrect/misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Worshipboy

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 fit. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great fit but falling apart after less than a month. See pic. Material coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Coulson Family

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe so far - very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fits my foot great - good tie box - did loosen the middle strings above the arch for some head room - great cushion - comfortable out of the box. Only had them a couple weeks, but good so far. My knees aren’t great, so I mostly walk in them. Hopefully the materials prove to be durable - the breathable sections look a bit fragile, but time will be the judge. Great shoe so far
customer_reviews.author: CAB

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes. Wrong, but nice.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I received the right shoes. According to my order I was supposed to receive the Solar Glide ST. The shoes I received are the Solar Glide M. The ST stands for "stability" which is something I need due to overpronation. they are nice looking shoes however, and I have some inserts that I can put in them but they're not going to be everyday runners. I thought the price was too good to be true and apparently it was. Be careful when you order.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort
customer_reviews.text: These are just what I needed. The quality and comfort are amazing as expected. This was the lowest price I could find and I'm happy to have found them. Definitely a must have if your looking for a shoe for long walks or exercising
customer_reviews.author: Vic o.

customer_reviews.title: Great for women too
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because my husband recommended them to me. I am aware they are men’s sizes but I couldn’t say no to a pair of $50 adidas. I did get a size 5 and I wear a size 8 in women’s. They fit perfectly! I recommend looking at adidas website for their size chart to see what size you would wear but overall this was a great purchase. I also love the back of the shoe, I always get blisters on my heel and not with these shoes! Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Adams

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing these every day and they've been great . The last pair split in the toes and Fleet Feet where I purchased them at would not deal with the problem. Its sad that we pay so much for an item that probably costs the company very little to make.
customer_reviews.author: M. B.

customer_reviews.title: Give this shoe some time - I was pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I run 5 full marathons a year. This is for training runs, in rotation with another shoe. Shoe seems stiff at first, give it 50 miles. With 150 miles on it I am pleased with the responsiveness. The soft heel cup makes it harder than most shoes to put on. However, I have purchased another pair on sale to replace these after 500-600 miles. Note: It is NOT a summer shoe. Way too hot with rubber sides. Great in the winter, however.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great for the gym for a big runner who needs a light motion control shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have only worn Adidas and Nike the last 45 years. These shoes are very easy to put on or take off. Decent surprising support. I am disappointed they do not make a real sturdy motion control support shoe. These will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Hoppalaw

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I go thru walking/running shoes pretty fast. These shoes seem like they'll hold up fine. They fit well and are nice and light. The materials are different ( stiff laces and kind of plastic tongue ) but it works. I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Harpie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but short lived.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but this is my second pair and both pairs only lasted 2 months before breaking (running about 150km). Not the best quality and won't be buying again unfortunately. Maybe good for casual easy wear shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been disappointed in Adidas running shoes lately. I'm a life long runner and Adidas running shoes lovers. These shoes have restored my faith in Adidas. They have great cushion and fit like a glove, without being too constricting.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: Shoe sole grip worn out in 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe soles grip have worn out just after 3 months of use. Other than that they’re very comfortable and have been great for my knees since the Boost cushions impact.
customer_reviews.author: F.Rod

customer_reviews.title: Great price !
customer_reviews.text: These are one of the top rated and most comfortable athletic shoes , on the market. I purchased these $140 shoes for under $80 , on amazon ! I got top quality Adidas shoes , with “ boost” technology , for about the same price that I would pay for the cheap , “ energy cloud “ Adidas shoes , sold at department stores !
customer_reviews.author: Fitz

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to more expensive shoes
customer_reviews.text: We decided to give these a try. Husband is die hard Brooks ghost fan, but you can't even get a good deal on last year's model anymore. He loves these shoes and the price point was nice.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Leib

customer_reviews.title: Nice feel and fit but makes squash sound
customer_reviews.text: stickiness. Shoes but after a couple days they started making sounds every step you took. Returned them cuz sound was too loud and embarrassing in public. Sounds like my shoes were filled with water.
customer_reviews.author: la

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit was spot on. This shoe gives plenty of support and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RUTH

customer_reviews.title: Received wrong shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Buy beware Solar Glides were advertised both online and on the box I received but what I got instead was the lesser shoe, the Solor DRIVES.
customer_reviews.author: Josh K

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very light weight and they work well. I have to get a new pair of running shoes every 6 months and these seem to work as I was hoping they would.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and true to size
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered these...they are a true fit. Color is spot on. Very comfy shoe.
customer_reviews.author: mg

customer_reviews.title: Falsley advertised as stability, "ST" - these are actually neutral running shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are falsely advertised as ST - stability - running shoes. These are neutral running shoes and should not be used by anyone like me who pronates! Using neutral running shoes as one who pronates can lead to injury.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to wear with your Denims to the mall
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well and are comfortable at first. Running in them, my ankle has pressure from the shoe, making them uncomfortable over longer runs. I'm an Adidas fan, but these are the first pair that have caused injuries. My first run I picked up knee pain and on my second run, I pulled my calf muscle. The shoes are now relegated to walking shoes. Can't recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Upper Started tearing after 8 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Garbage upper. Started tearing along horizontal style lines at about 8 weeks of minor use. I maybe wore them 20 times, didn't even jog in them. I own and have owned 6 different boost generations, normally love the shoes, but these are absolutely a waste of hard earned money. Addidas should be ashamed at putting out junk like this. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: ronsdogmax

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: It is my size, since it is narrow style, it is fit my feet perfectly. The color is a little darker than which showed online. And a little bit hard for my ankle, probably need some time to adapt to.
customer_reviews.author: thomas bruno

customer_reviews.title: Comfort.  Support.  Classy look
customer_reviews.text: Son uses them for cross training. Provides great support and they have a classy look with a not so “in your face “ design. Heck - I might get a pair !!
customer_reviews.author: 69 Camaro

customer_reviews.title: Running shoes the way they were intended!
customer_reviews.text: I would say these are some of the best shoes I have worn in years. Fit and ride as a true running shoe should.
customer_reviews.author: G Stroh

customer_reviews.title: Excellent item. Great price
customer_reviews.text: The shoes ate great and as described. The only thing is that they are a bit tight on the front but mabe they will loose up as I ware them.
customer_reviews.author: George L.

customer_reviews.title: Top quality running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good fit, comfortable, appear to be rugged. Good for all types of trails, dirt, concrete and tracks.
customer_reviews.author: P. Mazer

customer_reviews.title: Mislabeled!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is NOT the ST model!!! It’s regular Solarglide WITHOUT stability medial support. Infuriating!
customer_reviews.author: Backcountry Family

customer_reviews.title: Abrasive sides on the inside leads to side blisters
customer_reviews.text: Abrasive sides on the inside leads to side blisters, happened 3 consecutive times in 3 weeks with good socks.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Super !
customer_reviews.text: My husband is running a lot on long distance, and he loves these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Feel great and look better in person than the pic.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfort and support. Very good shoe for running.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic comfort, support, and durability. Just worked a 12-hour day in them. Feet and legs feel amazing at the end of the shift.
customer_reviews.author: Tim McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them. I usually buy Nike whose comfort are hit or miss. Probably never again after this pair.
customer_reviews.author: RJ Blue

customer_reviews.title: Very poor outsole durabilty
customer_reviews.text: I've owned many pairs of running shoes over the years and have never had an outsole that wore this fast(i.e. this shoe won't last you 100 miles). If durablility is important to you, look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: jcb

customer_reviews.title: i think it's important AMAZON PAYS IT'S FAIR SHARE OF TAXES
customer_reviews.text: what do I dislike? THE FACT MY CAT PAYED MORE TAXES THAN AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: ben jones

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have wider feet and they actually fit me great. They are very supportive feel great and they look good!
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Love ‘em !!!
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly. True to size. Style and color were exact to the pic.
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Fine
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine but there was small scratch on the side of the heel .
customer_reviews.author: TANVIR AHMED

customer_reviews.title: Run Marathon, feels good on my feet
customer_reviews.text: I run a marathon with them (male, 5'11, 200 lbs) and I feel fantastic going for my second one!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am runner and based on reviews I was expecting good quality running shoes. I've been using them for 4 months (running ~50miles/ month) and they are already broken. I do not recommend them and most likely I am not going to choose ADIDAS shoes anymore
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Return slip not provided
customer_reviews.text: Returning the product because they are too small. No return slip provided....could make it challenging to take advantage of Zappos free returns.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are light and breathable. I am a heavier runner and the cushioning seems to be holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory R Guillotte

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for any type of exercise
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for someone that doesn't have high arches and likes a stability of a wide footprint..the sole spreads outwards.
customer_reviews.author: Varun Mangewala

customer_reviews.title: Great Neutral Cushioning choice
customer_reviews.text: Love the initial step in feel. Looking forward to see if these will hold up under my 6’7” frame and 250+lbs weight.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Actually these are solar glide st for stability and I am a neutral, so these didn't work for me and I want to return them.
customer_reviews.author: James S

customer_reviews.title: Consistency is key
customer_reviews.text: Great Neutral shoe that I've been wearing for over a year. Fits as expected and last 400 miles per pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy until they use different fabric.
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after barely ANY use. Fabric tore apart over toe box.
customer_reviews.author: Charles O B Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love them. Fit well, are comfortable, and are a great stable shoe. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid it!
customer_reviews.text: They don't sell the advertised model but just the "solar glide". Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Nico

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes but little support
customer_reviews.text: The design is good. But I don’t feel like it supports your ankles when you run
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Top of shoe was torn
customer_reviews.text: After just 1 week of use, the top surface of one shoe tore along a line. My son had this exact model before and it lasted for many months.
customer_reviews.author: Elbert Chia

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are amazing and look good to.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are amazing and look good to. They can feel a bit tight on the heels at the beginning
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: Sucker Feet
customer_reviews.text: Light, springy, silly colors -- I like the total package these shoes offer. However, some may be annoyed by the noise the soles make on hard floors. It's like you're walking on octopus suckers. I enjoy it. You might, too. If you think the sound is more like squid suckers then no, you are wrong.
customer_reviews.author: OriginalJosh

product_meta.title: adidas Solar Glide, Men’s Solar Glide St
product_meta.description: Go the extra mile in these men's running shoes designed for the dedicated. A durable mesh upper provides a ventilated stride. Boost cushioning and a propulsion bar work together for comfort and stability over every mile.
feature_bullets: Weight: 11 ounces (size 9); Midsole drop: 10 mm (heel: 32 mm / forefoot: 22 mm); Neutral shoes offer flexibility and versatility, with premium cushioning
Engineered sandwich mesh upper for breathable comfort; Ribbing designed into forefoot for optimal fit during metatarsal flexion
Stretchweb outsole flexes naturally for an energized ride, while Continental Rubber gives you superior traction
Solar Fitwing Tongue extends down around the foot for a supportive feel; Solar Propulsion Rail helps guide and propel the foot
Dual-density Boost cushioning on the medial side provides energized stability for a smooth, responsive ride
